title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1204.11 - Stop work orders and revocation of permits and certificates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1204.11 - Stop work orders and revocation of permits and certificates

State Regulations
A construction-permitting agency may suspend or revoke a
construction permit, a code compliance certificate, or a temporary approval for
occupancy issued by such agency, or it may issue a stop work order halting
construction under its jurisdiction, if violations of the Uniform Code or this

Part are discovered and it is determined to be in the best interests of public
safety or of the State of New York to do so. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1204.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
